intro.title-trip: Kolomna, Zaraysk and Rape fields together

description.title-section: What will we see on our journey:

description-list.title: Zaraysk
description-list.info: We will see the Zaraisk Kremlin, the smallest Kremlin in Russia. We will also visit an interesting museum with amazing exhibits of 20,000 years old. We will also climb the pseudo-Gothic water tower to see the city from above and visit St. John the Baptist Cathedral - the main temple of the city.

description-list.title: Kolomna
description-list.info: In Kolomna we will have a fascinating excursion around the historical center of the city with a visit to the territory of the Kolomna Kremlin, the most beautiful temples and monsters of the city and walk along the most cozy streets of the city. And of course we will chop the famous Kolomna marshmallow and Kolomna kalach.

description-list.title: Rapeseed fields
description-list.info: In late May - early June, rapeseed blooms in the central part of Russia. This plant is used for the production of rapeseed oil. There are just a lot of such fields near Zaraisk and Kolomna, and we will have the opportunity to stop near them to take wonderful photos.

begin-trip.title: When and where do we start
begin-trip.detail-info: our journey starts at 8:00 in a cafe near the Taganskaya / Marksistskaya metro station

end-trip.title: When and where do we finish
end-trip.detail-info: the journey will end at the Taganskaya / Marksistskaya metro station at 22: 00-23:00

included.title: What is included in the price
included.detail-info: all transfers, entrance tickets, a tour of Kolomna and the Zaraisk Kremlin

not-included.title: What is not included in the price
